```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidytext)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

#### About the data
**Each text is a person's tweets about a ticker or the brazilian market stock exchange**

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# reading the data
tweets_aval = read_csv("../data/tweets_stocks.csv")
```


### What are the most frequent words in the tweets?
############### over 200 ocurrencies
```{r, warnings=FALSE, message=FALSE}
text_df <- tweets_aval[,2]
tokens <- text_df %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text)

tokens %>%
  count(word, sort = TRUE) %>%
  filter(n > 200) %>%
  mutate(word = reorder(word, n)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(word, n)) +
  geom_col() +
  xlab(NULL) +
  coord_flip()
```
